exa.verification: Fernando Blower is a well-documented figure in the Rio de Janeiro gastronomy scene. Web search results from Valor Econômico (2025/2026) confirm he is the President of SindRio (the union for hotels, bars, and restaurants in Rio) and the Executive Director of ANR Brasil.
